languages.text: "Должны. И мы с тобой должны! Или ты думаешь, что твоя душа чиста? Нет. Ты, я, все они — грешники, и лишь покаяние может спасти наши души от ереси".

traits.locale_text: "Ежели так, то и мы с тобой должны! Или ты думаешь, что твоя душа чиста? Нет. Ты, я, все они — грешники, и лишь покаяние может спасти наши души от ереси".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."
languages.original_text: "Должны. И мы с тобой должны! Или ты думаешь, что твоя душа чиста? Нет. Ты, я, все они — грешники, и лишь покаяние может спасти наши души от ереси".

traits.locale_text: "They must. And so must you and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all sinners and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "They must. And so must you and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all sinners and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all transgressors and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all transgressors and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “他们必须烧死，你我也一样！你以为你的灵魂是纯洁的吗？不，它并不纯洁。无论是你、我，还是他们所有人，我们都是罪人。只有忏悔才能将我们的灵魂从异端邪说中拯救出来。”
languages.original_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."

traits.locale_text: “他们必须烧死，你我也一样！你以为你的灵魂是纯洁的吗？不，它并不纯洁。无论是你、我，还是他们所有人，我们都是罪人。只有忏悔才能将我们的灵魂从异端邪说中拯救出来。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「そうしなければならない。お前も、私もだ！それとも、お前は自分の魂が純粋だと思っているのか？ありえない。お前も私も全員が不品行を行っている。魂を腐敗から救うのは贖罪だけだ」
languages.original_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「そうしなければならない。お前も、私もだ！それとも、お前は自分の魂が純粋だと思っているのか？ありえない。お前も私も全員が不品行を行っている。魂を腐敗から救うのは贖罪だけだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Deben. ¡Al igual que nosotros! ¿O cree que su alma es pura? No lo es. Usted, yo y todos somos unos depravados y lo único que puede salvar nuestras almas de la herejía es el arrepentimiento».
languages.original_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Deben. ¡Al igual que nosotros! ¿O cree que su alma es pura? No lo es. Usted, yo, todos somos transgresores y lo único que puede salvar nuestras almas de la herejía es el arrepentimiento».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Das müssen sie. Und auch Ihr müsst es, und ich! Oder haltet Ihr Eure Seele für rein? Das ist sie nicht. Ihr, ich, sie alle, wir alle sind Schurken, und nur durch Buße können unsere Seelen vor der Ketzerei bewahrt werden."
languages.original_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Das müssen sie. Und auch Ihr müsst es, und ich! Oder haltet Ihr Eure Seele für rein? Das ist sie nicht. Ihr, ich, sie alle, wir alle sind Sünder, und nur durch Buße können unsere Seelen vor der Ketzerei bewahrt werden."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Oui, tous. De même que vous et moi ! Ou pensez-vous vraiment que votre âme est pure ? Croyez-moi, ce n'est pas le cas. Vous, moi, eux... Nous sommes tous des dépravés, et seul le repentir peut nous sauver de l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, tous. De même que vous et moi ! Ou pensez-vous vraiment que votre âme est pure ? Croyez-moi, ce n'est pas le cas. Vous, moi, eux... Nous sommes tous des transgresseurs, et seul le repentir peut nous sauver de l'hérésie. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Evet, yakılmalılar. Tıpkı senin ve benim gibi! Yoksa sen kendi ruhunun saf olduğunu mu sanıyorsun? Hayır, değil. Sen, ben, onların hepsi, hepimiz günahkârız. Ruhlarımızı kâfirlikten kurtarmanın tek yolu da tövbe etmek."
languages.original_text: "They must. And so must you, and I! Or do you imagine your soul is pure? It is not. You, me, all of them, we are all reprobates, and only repentance can save our souls from heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, yakılmalılar. Tıpkı senin ve benim gibi! Yoksa sen kendi ruhunun saf olduğunu mu sanıyorsun? Hayır, değil. Sen, ben, onların hepsi, hepimiz günahkârız ve ruhlarımızı kâfirlikten kurtarmanın tek yolu tövbe etmek."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
